description: This file implements advanced object record access functions for a Data Model component in a C-based DSL Home Model system, including functions for retrieving parameter counts, values, info, attributes, and managing child objects. It appears to be part of a larger framework for managing device parameters, likely in a TR-069 or CWMP context.

classes.name: PDslhObjRecordObject
classes.description: Object representing a record in the Data Model, providing methods for parameter management and child object operations.

classes.name: PDslhVarRecordObject
classes.description: Object representing a variable record within an object, including methods for retrieving and setting parameter values.

classes.name: PDSLH_OBJ_ENTITY_OBJECT
classes.description: Descriptor for object entities, defining object description details such as type, writability, and parameters.

classes.name: PDSLH_VAR_ENTITY_OBJECT
classes.description: Descriptor for variable entities, defining parameter description details.

methods.name: ULONG DslhObjroGetTotalParamNumber(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bFromAcs,BOOL bSelfIncluded)
methods.description: Calculates total number of parameters under this object, including dynamic children if specified.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroGetAllParamValues(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hParamValueArray,PULONG pulArraySize,BOOL bFromAcs,unsigned int writeID)
methods.description: Retrieves the values of all parameters under this object, including child objects if applicable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroGetAllParamInfos(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hParamInfoArray,PULONG pulArraySize,BOOL bNextLevelOnly,BOOL bFromACS)
methods.description: Retrieves info (name and properties) for all parameters under this object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroGetAllParamAttribs(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hParamAttribArray,PULONG pulArraySize,BOOL bFromAcs)
methods.description: Retrieves attribute information for all parameters under this object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroSetAllParamAttribs(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSetParamAttrib)
methods.description: Sets parameter attributes for all parameters under this object based on provided configuration.

methods.name: BOOL DslhObjroVerifyChanges(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char ** ppFaultParamName)
methods.description: Verifies whether the changes made to parameters are acceptable before committing.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroCommitChanges(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Commits the previous changes to parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroCommitChanges2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Validates and commits changes, including existing variable records.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroCancelChanges(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cancels any uncommitted changes to parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroAddChildObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PULONG pulInstanceNumber)
methods.description: Adds a new child object instance within a table object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroDelChildObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pObjName)
methods.description: Deletes an existing child object instance within a table object.

ctags.name: DslhObjroGetAllParamValues
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hParamValueArray,PULONG pulArraySize,BOOL bFromAcs,unsigned int writeID)
